org.arl.fjage

Interface TimestampProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Agent, DiscreteEventSimulator, Platform, RealTimePlatform, ShellAgent

    public interface TimestampProvider
    Represents any class that can provide a timestamp.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long currentTimeMillis()
      Gets the current platform time in milliseconds.
      long nanoTime()
      Gets the current platform time in nanoseconds.

    • Method Detail

      • currentTimeMillis

        long currentTimeMillis()
        Gets the current platform time in milliseconds. For real-time platforms, this time is epoch time. For simulation platforms, this time is simulation time.
        Returns:
        time in milliseconds.

      • nanoTime

        long nanoTime()
        Gets the current platform time in nanoseconds. For real-time platforms, this time is epoch time. For simulation platforms, this time is simulation time. The time is nanosecond precision but not necessarily nanosecond accuracy.
        Returns:
        time in nanoseconds.
